Question: By 1961, this person had joined the staff of CJOH-TV, then a new television station in Ottawa.
Hints: With another presidential election taking place in 2000, this person had some more political reporting duties that year.
"The job was pretty intimidating for a guy like me in a tiny city in Canada," this person later recalled.
This person left a $50m estate, half went to Freed; most of the rest to his son and daughter.
